page.title: 10A SCHOOLCHILD'S 'WORKING'DAY
page.content: {On a Tuesday I get up at 7.30 and rush to get ready for school because I set off at 8.00. We then go to the school and usually get there at 8.30. I wait about 10 minutes when my friends get to school. When the whistle goes we go inside and Mr.Crabb does the register. After registration Mr.Crabb tells us what we are doing that day. Normally it's S.M.P, English, Mental maths and computer. We start our groups at about 9.30, until 10.00 we do our first group.From 10.00 to 10.30 we work on our second group.10.30 to 10.45 is play time. At 10.45 we work until 12.00. We have lunch from 12.00 to 1.15 then we do cycling proficiency and from 2.30 to 2.45 we have play. Last session we have P.E. When I get home I do my piano practice have tea, read and go to bed.
